import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from 'react'; import './signin.css'; import Google from './googleOAuth'; import { ButtonPopRightLite } from '../../buttons'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' const SignIn = () => { const push = useHistory(null) const [expand, setExpand] = useState({ expandEmail: false, expandGoogle: false, expandGuest: false, expandUser: true, expandPass: true }) const googleRef = useRef(null) const guestRef = useRef(null) const emailRef = useRef(null) const userInputRef = useRef(null) const passInputRef = useRef(null) useEffect(() => { // emailRef.current.addEventListener("mouseenter", () => setExpand({ ...expand, expandEmail: true })); // emailRef.current.addEventListener("mouseleave", () => setExpand({ ...expand, expandEmail: false })); // googleRef.current.addEventListener("mouseenter", () => setExpand({ ...expand, expandGoogle: true })); // googleRef.current.addEventListener("mouseleave", () => setExpand({ ...expand, expandGoogle: false })); // guestRef.current.addEventListener("mouseenter", () => setExpand({ ...expand, expandGuest: true })); // guestRef.current.addEventListener("mouseleave", () => setExpand({ ...expand, expandGuest: false })); // emailRef.current.addEventListener("onclick", () => setExpand({ ...expand, expandEmail: true })); // googleRef.current.addEventListener("onclick", () => setExpand({ ...expand, expandGoogle: true })); // guestRef.current.addEventListener("onclick", () => setExpand({ ...expand, expandGuest: true })); }, []) return (
